chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: jax-doclets allows you to generate JavaDoc documentation for specific Java annotation-based extensions such as:

listitem.para: JAX-RS: the RESTful API for Java
JAXB: the XML binding API for Java

chapter.para: The goal of jax-doclets is to let you write documentation for your JAX-RS API and JAXB structures in JavaDoc, where it belongs, where it is maintainable, and produce a quality JavaDoc-style documentation.

section.title: Information
section.para: jax-doclets is an open-source project maintained by Lunatech Labs.
